name: PREVIEW: Qatar Q Suites, EgyptAir, Emirates First Class, and more
description:
Each Saturday over the next several weeks, I’ll publish a new video highlighting another aspect of some of the most epic traveling ever to appear on this channel. In this short video, you’ll get you a preview of what’s to come!

We flew with Qatar to Kenya experiencing their industry-leading Q Suites, Business class so good, they say, you don’t need First Class.

We then went out to the Masai Mara with Air Kenya and encountered just about every African animal you can imagine.

From there, we traveled with Kenya Airways to the Seychelles where we took in the unmatched beaches and watched giant bats with four-foot wingspans.

From there, we traveled to Cairo in something Qatar calls First Class. 

In Egypt we tried out EgytAir’s A220’s as we traveled domestically. 

While experiencing the magic of Egypt, our planned return flight to Dulles was cancelled and, after a last-minute scramble, we booked Emirates on not one, but two A380’s in First Class!

All this and more coming soon!

Thumbnail Photo by Ryan Patterson, "DieCastRyan" on Instagram!

0:00 Introduction
0:22 Preview
